#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin >> t;
    cout << endl; //extra blank line
    while(t--)
    {
        int n;
        cin >> n;
        int flag=0;
        int ans;
        for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
        {
            int temp=i;
            ans=i;
            while(temp>0)
            {
                ans=ans+temp%10;
                temp=temp/10;
            }
            if(ans==n)
            {
                flag=1;
                ans=i;
                break;
            }
        }
        if(flag==1)
            cout << ans << endl;
        else
            cout << "NONE" << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
